description:
Munna is known as the Dream Eater Pokémon. It resembles a tapir. It can smoke out what looks like a reflection after eating the dreams of people and Pokémon. It evolves into Musharna when exposed to a Moon Stone.
Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava stated "the fact that it can eat my dreams makes it one Pokémon that I would want as an ally rather than an enemy."
name: Munna
